fields.name: Integration Journal
fields.description: A guided, lay-flat journal built for pre-work, ceremony notes, and integration with plenty of room for sketches.
features: 120gsm cream pages with a soft-touch cover and ribbon marker
Prompts for intention setting, navigation, and after-care reflections
Lay-flat binding so you can write comfortably anywhere

fields.name: Field Safety Kit
fields.description: A compact pouch with the safety basics for respectful journeys at home or in the field.
features: Grounding prompts, pulse oximeter sleeve, and comfort mask
Dropper bottle labels and a laminated safety plan card
Space for essentials: electrolytes, chewing gum, soft earplugs

fields.name: Cue Card Pack
fields.description: Pocket-sized cards with calming cues for the sitter and explorer when the moment gets wobbly.
fields.badge: Best for the middle of the trip
features: 15 double-sided cards with grounding, breathing, and re-entry cues
Wipe-clean finish; comes with a minimal lanyard for quick access
Space to jot key reminders so helpers stay aligned
